headline: These Ultra-High-Yielding Dividend Stocks Are No Joke
summary: You see a high dividend yield on a stock and believe you can make a lot of passive income.  Realty Income (NYSE: O), Brookfield Renewable (NYSE: BEPC)(NYSE: BEP), and Verizon (NYSE: VZ) all currently pay dividends yielding more than 5%, putting them several times higher than the S&P 500's (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC) 1.3% yield.  Because of that, you can confidently buy these dividend stocks without the fear of eventually looking like a fool for falling for a trap.
